epd_metadata.epd_owner_address: Avenida de Manoteras 20 Edif. Tokyo 1#planta. 28050 Madrid (Spain)
product_category_rules: PCR 2019:14 Construction Products. Version 1.11, c-PCR-003 Concrete and concrete elements (EN 16757). Version 2019-12-20
epd_metadata.un_cpc_code: 375 Articles of concrete, cement and plaster
epd_metadata.epd_scope: Cradle to grave and Module D (A+B+C+D)
epd_metadata.allocation_procedure: Allocation based on volume where necessary
epd_metadata.cut_off_rules: Minimum 95% of total inflows (mass and energy) per module included, more than 99% accounted for
excluded_processes: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to and from work

product_description.product_name: ECOPact: AGILIA SUELO C, ARTEVIA HDOS 275 and H25
product_description.product_use: Continuous pavements; Agilia Suelo C is a self-leveling mortar
product_description.product_characteristics: High quality concrete and mortar with extraordinary capacity and great finishing
product_description.functional_unit: One m3 of ready-mix concrete/mortar fulfilling technical performance for construction with a reference service life of 100 years
product_description.hazardous_substances: No hazardous substances listed in the Candidate List of SVHC used above 0.1% by weight

lca_information.system_boundaries: Cradle to grave including Modules A1 to C4 and Module D
modules_included: A2 Transport of raw materials to factory
B1 Use phase - carbonation CO2 fixation
C3 Waste processing for reuse, recovery and/or recycling
lca_information.data_representativeness: Annual production inventory from 1 January 2021 to 31 December 2021 from Alcobendas and Papiol manufacturing plants
lca_information.allocation: Volume-based allocation for energy, water consumption, and waste production
lca_information.cut_off_rules: Minimum 95% of total inflows included, more than 99% accounted for
excluded_impacts: Infrastructure, construction, production equipment and tools not directly consumed

transport_to_waste_processing.model_used: Same as A4 transport to building site

carbon_emission_context.carbon_fixation_by_carbonation: Included in use phase (B1) following EN 16757 methodology

additional_info.company_description: Holcim is a global leader in building materials and solutions with activities in cement, aggregates, concrete solutions and products. It aims to lead the industry towards low carbon construction with strong R&D focus.
additional_info.production_sites: All manufacturing plants of Holcim in Spain
environmental_commitments: Registered carbon footprint and commitment to reduce greenhouse gas emissions for 2016-2020
Commitment to circular economy and waste lifecycle maximization
Proactive restoration of quarries to increase biodiversity and natural capital
differences_vs_previous_versions: New specific EPD for ECOPlanet CEM IA 42,5 N
references: General Programme Instruction of the International EPD® System. Version 3.01
Holcim ECOPlanet CEM I/A 42,5N EPD S-P-05185

verification_statement.product: ECOPact: AGILIA SUELO C, ARTEVIA HDOS 275 and H25
conformity: General Programme Instructions for the International EPD® System v.3.01
